name: Heart Forth, Alicia
blurb: A '90s-inspired Metroidvania RPG about a young wizard on her journey to stop a Spirit from consuming her homeland.

rewards.reward: Early Bird Backer - A digital copy of Heart Forth, Alicia for the PC, DRM-free or through Steam when the game is released \u25cf A set of high-resolution backer-exclusive wallpapers. \u25cf A backer-exclusive Starbound-inspired accessory \u25cf Your name in the game's credits

Backer - A digital copy of Heart Forth, Alicia for the PC, DRM-free or through Steam when the game is released \u25cf A set of high-resolution backer-exclusive wallpapers. \u25cf A backer-exclusive Starbound-inspired accessory \u25cf Your name in the game's credits

Digital Premium Tier - All of the above rewards \u25cf A digital copy of Heart Forth, Alicia's OST \u25cf Receive the game through Steam Early Access \u25cf A second backer-exclusive accessory to help Alicia on her journey

Digital Deluxe Tier - All of the above rewards \u25cf A digital copy of Heart Forth Alicia's Talebook, a custom-created work containing character and location illustrations, their backstories, the world's mythology and nomenclature, a timeline for different cultures and places, production notes, and more, all compiled in a single unified package. \u25cf  An extra game key

Alpha Demo + Pet Companion Tier - All of the above rewards \u25cf An in-game pet companion with a Kickstarter-exclusive skin \u25cf Access to a private alpha demo of Heart Forth, Alicia that will be released during the game's development process \u25cf Access to the game's private tester forums
Physical Game - All of the above rewards \u25cf A physical copy of the game and its instruction manual, designed and boxed in the style of the PS1 games that inspired Heart Forth, Alicia.

The Talebook - All of the above rewards \u25cf A physical copy of Heart Forth Alicia's Talebook, a custom-created work containing character and location illustrations, their backstories, the world's mythology and nomenclature, a timeline for different cultures and places, production notes, and more, all compiled in a single unified package.

Elite Access - All of the above rewards  \u25cf Access to ALL of the game's alpha builds to provide feedback and share your ideas with the developers \u25cf As a token of our thanks, you'll collaborate with us to design your own in-game statue dedicated to your contributions, which will display the quote of your choice \u25cf A 24" x 36" poster featuring a piece of the game's artwork \u25cf Your name in the game's credits as an elite backer.

Master Smith - All of the above rewards \u25cf Work with the development team to design an item for the game, including its flavor text and icon, whether it's a consumable item (restorative effects, status effects, special powers, etc.) or a special, custom accessory item.
The Foe Demiurge - All of the above rewards EXCEPT the item/accessory-design component of the Master Smith tier \u25cf Work with us to design your own enemy to put in an available area in the game!

Crafter of Secrets - All of the above rewards  \u25cf Work with the development team to design a secret or easter egg to hide in the game. Want to leave your mark in the game for everyone to see? Have your own secret room? Create your own secret, quirky event? This is the tier for you.

The Demiurge - All of the above rewards \u25cf Work with us to design your own enemy or NPC for the game. Put yourself in the game! Put your dog in the game! We'll work with you to adapt your request into Heart Forth, Alicia's world!

Questmaker Megapack - All of the above rewards \u25cf Tie your previous three creations together with a quest! \u25cf  Be recognized as a master backer in the credits \u25cf Receive a signed copy of the poster \u25cf Receive a signed, leather-bound version of the Talebook.

The Great \u00c9liadin King or Queen Tier - All of the above rewards \u25cf Be recognized in the credits as an Associate Producer \u25cf Work with us to design a secret mob boss enemy and its drops. Tie it in with your previous designs to create the ultimate quest with the ultimate reward!

The Ancient \u00c1umma Tier - All of the above rewards except the mob boss design component of The Great \u00c9liadin King or Queen Tier\r\n\u25cf Work with us to design one of three themed mob bosses that will be found at the end of each Challenge Dungeon and its drops! \u25cf Manami Matsumae will compose a track specifically for this enemy.
